choices: Screw Class, I'm just not up for it today..,
1.content:
One would think that any day in school wouldn't involve anything more than maybe a brief fight if you're lucky. Not today.

You enter the Lakeside High School. You're tired and have no interest in being there, for you stayed up almost all night studying for the damned test in English.

Making you're way towards the hallways, you feel an eerie tightness in your skin and insides. You nearly collapse, and in the midst of it accidentally run into the back of your Ex-Girlfriend "Kasie's" backpack, causing her to drop her books. She immediately turns around, and when she finds out that it's you, she gags in disgust, and picks up her books.

"Asshole", she says.

You don't respond, you're too shocked by what had just occurred. Still, you have a class to get to, and decide to pass it off as some effect from your lack-of-sleep.

What Class are you going to?
1.title: CHAPTER I - Hell On School Property

11.content:
Ms. Brooks starts her class with a quick quiz before the final test on the book that you read. She's wearing her Fall Clothes: A T-Shirt, Jeans, and Cowgirl Boots. You don't want to let her down, you're one of her favorites. The Quiz was very brief, your eyelids are getting extremely heavy.

"Alright Guys, good luck", she says as she passes out the final sheet of paper.

You look at the first question, place your pencil upon the test paper, and scribble down a few words. You get that eerie feeling inside and outside of your body again. You can't take all of this pressure and tiredness and stress all at once. You practically pass out.

The bell has rung, everybody is out of the classroom, and you're still asleep with the pencil grasped in your hand. Ms Brooks approaches your desk, and brushes her fingers through your hair. Immediately, you shoot up from your nap, and look up to see your teacher. A chill runs down from your head to your feet. Luckily for you, Ms. Brooks is more understanding than most other teachers in the school.

"This isn't like you", she says in a concerned tone, "Why don't you come back after school and finish this up for me, or you could come during your lunch hour, alright bud?"

You nod your head, and apologize a dozen times. She giggles.

"It's alright, I'm just glad to see that my boots put a little extra height on me".

You level up with her. She's right, those boots have put at least 3 more inches on her.

So, when will you finish your test?
11.title: CHAPTER II - Not-So-Great Expectations

choices: She sees you, but thinks your an insect
112.content:
It wasn't long before you went to lunch. You didn't grab much, just a granola bar and some milk. For whatever reason, you just couldn't wake up. In the middle of lunch, you decided to try and take the test again. You head back to Ms Brooks, hoping you can stay awake long enough this time. When you get there, she's happy to see you. You start working on your test immediately.

Unfortunately, fate isn't on your side today. After a few minutes of working on it, you pass out. When you wake up, it feels like your entire body is sore. You get up and look around. At first, you think you're dreaming, everything, including your teacher, was huge! You stand up and notice that most of your clothes didn't shrink, you're currently in your underwear.

"Hey… where did he go?" Your teacher asked. Ms Brooks got up and walked over to your seat. Perfect, hopefully you could get her attention. Once she got over to you, you suddenly realized just how much taller she was. She was like a sky scraper! Nevertheless, you jump up and down to try and get her attention.
112.title: Sky scraper teacher

1122.content:
The Skyscraper Teacher was your only hope, and you decide that the only way to get her attention was to jump around the seat, trying to find your way out of the massive clothes.

Ms. Brooks picks up the shirt that once had fit your body. Her face shows a confused and concerned look. She looks down, and sees your tiny, bug-like body.

"Jeez, I told them that I needed that bug problem fixed", she says as she walks over to her desk.

You swallow. This is not good. You scream, and shout, but it has no effect. She comes over with a napkin in her hand. This is your last chance to get her to notice you.

What do you do?
1122.title: Evidently your a bug...SHIT!

12.content:
You enter the Class, and place your backpack next to your chair. You sit, and greet Lesley. She smiles and waves, she's more interested in her phone. You look over to see Natalie, who has one eye covered with her curly ginger hair. She had her glasses tipped down to the end of her nose as she reads a book.

A lecture starts, and your teacher speaks of wise money choices. Think about your purchases. What joys can they bring you? What consequences might they obtain? After the lecture, you and your class are ordered to place up stands around you so cheating on the test will be prevented. You do so, just trying to get though the class, maybe you'll secretly get a little more sleep behind the barriers.

Your now in the middle of a test, nobody is able to see you. You briefly fall into a rest, but the shoot your head back up. You drop your pencil, and reach to grab it.

"Damn," you say. It rolled to the middle of the floor.

Now on the floor, you reach to grab the pencil, and at this moment, you begin to feel that same exact feeling as you did before you ran into your Ex, only worse. The tightening in your chest and skin is unbearable! You try and let out a scream, however your vocal cords feel as if they have shriveled up.

Before you know it, the unbelievable happens. You shrink to the size of one and a half inches! The size equivalent to a Lego figure.

You look around in complete awe. You know that this is not a safe place to be in. You look around the table (this is one of the stretched out tables that can seat about eight students at once), and see two of the people you know best. Lesley, whose wearing those Birkenstock Sandals, is probably your best bet, for you know her the best. However, you know her enough to know that she DESPISES bugs. Natalie is your second best option. She's wearing black Converse shoes, one of the laces untied. You don't know her as well, and only have had a few conversations with her. Who knows how she'll react? Everybody else are practically strangers to you.

You know your choices. Who'll it be?
12.title: CHAPTER II - Choose Your Bets Wisely

13.content:
Class starts, and your teacher immediatly goes into discussing functions and integrals. You try and listen, but your eyes just have had enough. You can hardly even keep a steady grasp on your pencil. Stress starts to build up. Natalie, a girl sitting next to you, notices your struggle, and hands you some of her coffee she bought at the shop close to the school. You gladly take in and take a few drinks.

This helps for a good twenty minutes, however it is not enough. You start to get extremely tired. Your eyelids are so heavy that you have to use your fingers to keep them open. You can't take it any longer, and settle into a deep sleep.

Class has now ended, and you feel a hard tapping on your shoulder. You open your eyes to see Natalie, however you have to look up to see her.

You look down, and figure out a TERRIBLE realization. You have shrunk to the size of a rag doll! You sit in the chair as if you were a mere infant in a high chair.

You and Natalie are the only ones in the classroom.

"I....I don't know what to say", she spoke.

"Natalie, you've got to help me out!" you shout.

Natalie hesitates, and snatches you up from out of your chair.

"I'm going to have to hide you", she starts, "It's to dangerous for you to be seen like this. I've got my backpack, or my purse. Which do you want?"

Where do you want to be put?

Where do you want to be put?
13.title: CHAPTER II - No Simple Analysis

14.content:
You're getting a little treat today in Art. You and a partner are going to draw each other for a grade, just to see how much you've improved. You pull out your sketch book and your numerous pencils as everybody else gets up and races to each other to be partners. Alexis is also struggling to get her stuff, and by the time your both ready, everybody else has a partner. You both shrug. Looks like you two are going to be spending the next hour and a half with one another.

The two of you make your way toward one of the empty rooms in the school. As you set up your equipment and supplies, you both engage in conversation.

"You ready for Fall Break? Alexis says to you.

"No, I just love staying up every night for a test to only fail it the next day", you say sarcastically. "Yes, I'm ready for break.

The first half hour passes, the two of you sit across from each other and both have a fairly good sketch. Your only problem is that you can't get the nose quiet right. You erase, and erase, and erase furiously. Eventually, the paper tares, completely ruining the sketch.

"Damnit!" you shout, and shove the sketch book out of your sight.

Alexis laughs, "If I have a dollar for every time I did that".

You didn't even hear her, for the tightness in your chest and skin from before has came back, and is worse than ever. You fall to your knees, groping at your chest. Quickly, Alexis stands up and kneels beside you, her hands shaking as she places them on your shoulders.

"Whats going on? What's happening!" she asks hysterically.

You're unable to answer. You see your very hands getting smaller. Your insides shift from one place to the other and your bones and flesh begin to feel as if they're melting. Before you know it your the size of an action figure.

The pain has gone away. You stand up.

"I'm fine", you say through breaths, "I don't k-"

You look to your right and see a massive hand sitting before you. Slowly, you look up and see a concerned Alexis. You fall to your knees again.

"Oh God! Oh Jesus, Alexis don't hurt me!" you shout desperately.

"No, no, no! I won't hurt you honey, I just- I, I'm shocked. I don't know what to make of this."

"What am I going to do?" you ask. You're eager for an answer for whatever happened.

"I....I don't know. Your the size of one of my old Ken dolls".

"Alexis you've got to help me!"

Alexis sits down. The sound of her buttocks hitting the floor is comparable to the sound of an earthquake. She begins to sob.

"Hey, hey, It's fine, it's fine. I'm fine, Alexis", you say. You go up to her foot and pat it.

"I'm sorry", she says, "I'm not good under stress."

"I can't let anyone see me like this", you say.

"Well", she starts, "I have an old dollhouse in my basement you could use, is that fine with you?"

"Yes! Oh God yes Alexis thank you!"

She wipes her tears, and holds her hand out for you to step onto. You do just that, and she raises you up to her eye level.

"Hey!" she says, "Your pretty good at Chemistry right?"

"I'm okay at it", you tell her, "Why?"

"You think you can help me out with a little test I'm taking?" Alexis asks, "I'll give you a little treat if you do."

"Well..."

What do you say?
14.title: CHAPTER II - Give me a Break

15.content:
You decide that class just isn't an option today, for you're way too tired and already ahead on your work, you deserve the break. Setting your back pack in your locker, you shut the door, and make your way toward the library.
As you step into the quiet room, you look around to see a few familiar faces around. Katelyn, one of the most kind girls you have ever met, sits at a table studying. She looks up to see you, smiles, and waves. You wave back, and continue to walk through the room.
Ashley and Paisley, twin sisters, sit side by side at the computers. They giggle and laugh among one another. You could use the humor of the two in your day, and walk towards them. However, another girl walks to them and sits in the only open seat. You continue to walk.
The last, and less wanted face you wanted to see, is Kasie, your Ex-Girlfriend. Bumping her in the hall by accident most likely made her want to rip your throat out. She is looking at some odd book.You turn the other direction and head for the Fiction section.
As you scroll through the aisles of the books, you remember that you have a TEST that day in Math! Your heart begins to race.
"Shit! The one day I decide to ditch class!" you say to yourself.
Just at that moment, you start to feel that same eerie tightness upon your skin and insides as you had felt moments before. You want to scream in pain u your mouth can hardly even move, almost as if it is sealed shut. You drop to your knees and start grasping at your heart.
Closing your eyes, your only thoughts are on screaming for help. You try to pry your mouth open, but your efforts cause no change. The pain is unbearable!
Eventually, your mouth begins to budge open, and soon enough you let out a scream loud enough for the whole school to hear. You open your eyes...and cannot believe your surroundings.
Everything around you most have grown fifty feet! The books, the shelfs, even the god forsaken people. You begin to panic. You need to be noticed. Which way should you go?
15.title: Probably should have went to class...

info.brief_description: Survive this Story's Giantess' after being shrunk to the size of a mere Action Figure.
info.description:
Welcome to The Story! Now, let me get the facts straight that this is a Fetish Fantasy, so if your not into this sort of thing, your more than free to click the "Fuck GO BACK" button. Still here? Groovy. Lets meet some of our many characters:

You: Of course, your going to be in this story. You know who you are. In this story however, you will be a Junior in High School.

Ms. Brooks: Your English Teacher. She's 26, has straight blonde hair down to her shoulders, and YOU in particular are one of her favorite students.

Alexis: A girl in your Art Class. You share the same interest, and she may actually like you, you're not sure. She too has blond hair, however not as straight, also longer.

Katelyn: The Most Kind girl in the probably the whole school. Her freckles and blue eyes mainly stand out, but also her long drawn blonde hair.

Kasie: Your annoying Ex. She often keeps her jet black hair in a pony tail and knows about all of your darkest fantasies. She still is a little mad at you over the break-up.

Lesley: A Senior in High School. She sits next to you in one of your classes. Her hippie like style mainly attracts you. She has a nose piercing, and long blonde hair that of which goes all the way down to her hips.

Natalie: Also a senior. She wears glasses, but you can only see one eye for her curly ginger hair often blocks the other. You don't know much about her.

Ashley and Paisley: Twins in the school. You haven't personally dated them, but have heard rumors that "they're into kinky shit".

Have Fun, and the best of Luck.
